com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.image
Class PixelArray.Integer

java.lang.Object
  com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.image.PixelArray
      com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.image.PixelArray.Integer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable, Serializable
Enclosing class:
PixelArray
public static class PixelArray.Integer
extends PixelArray
implements Serializable

The Integer class defines a PixelData specified in int depth.

See Also:
Serialized Form

overlay

public void overlay(PixelArray another)
Description copied from class: PixelArray
Overlay with another pixel array - the overlay is done for each pixel values if pixel value at the ith position of this PixelArray is less than the given PixelArray it is overwritten with the pixel value from the given PixelArray. Note, the type must match and this operation will mutate this PixelArray

Specified by:
overlay in class PixelArray
Parameters:
another - another pixel array of the same depth
